name: frog_pinball
description:
When a frog touches a tree, click the mouse to jump in the direction of the mouse.

You can press the 'esc' key to restart.

I know it's very crude. I just wanted to test the idea of how pinball and frog jump would work together.

The jam period was shorter than I thought and I thought the idea was good, but I couldn't come up with the right controls.
